data.name: All In One Account
data.description: Combining transaction and loan facilities in a single account, and effectively acting like a revolving line of credit, the All In One makes managing your finances easy and gives you access to working capital when you need it.

features.additionalValue: A limit of one card per Authorised Signatory applies.
features.additionalInfo: Additional Rabobank Visa Debit Card may be issued to an Authorised Signatory upon request.
Access to your funds via your Rabobank Visa Debit Card.

features.additionalValue: Includes advanced notifications sent to clients.
features.additionalInfo: An alert about future events or notifications.
Clients can apply for an overdraft.
Redraw of repaid principal is available.
Unlimited free transactions available to clients.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Rabobank rural banking products are designed for farm businesses.
Available to Businesses, Individuals (Sole Traders), Partnerships, Companies, Trusts.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Standard 50)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at the time of ordering new cheque book.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Large 50)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at the time of ordering new cheque book.

fees.name: Cheque Book Fee (Large 100)
fees.additionalInfo: Charged at the time of ordering new cheque book.

fees.name: VISA Debit Card Currency Conversion Fee (% of converted amount)
fees.additionalInfo: Fees may be charged for overseas transactions by the overseas merchant or bank. If a transaction is refunded, fees are not refunded.

fees.name: Payment Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For Direct Entry Payments by Rabobank staff.

fees.name: Payment Maintenance Fee (when changes are requested)
fees.additionalInfo: For Direct Entry Payments by Rabobank staff.

fees.name: Same Day Funds Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For Real Time Gross Settlement.

fees.name: Foreign Currency - Telegraphic Transfer (Out) Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees may be charged by the overseas bank.

fees.name: Foreign Currency - Telegraphic Transfer (In) Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees may be charged by the overseas bank.

fees.name: Foreign Currency - Bank Draft Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees may be charged by the overseas bank.

fees.name: Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Dishonour fees are charged in addition to the excess interest charge that may apply for overdrawing an account.

fees.name: Replacement VISA Debit Card Fee (within Australia)
fees.additionalInfo: Additional courier charge may apply if express delivery required. Courier fees charged are the standard fees for orders of that type to that location.

fees.name: International Replacement VISA Debit Card Fee (if card lost or stolen)
fees.additionalInfo: Charges applied by VISA. Replacement card delivered to local institution nominated by VISA.

fees.name: International Emergency Cash (if card lost or stolen)
fees.additionalInfo: Charges applied by VISA. Replacement card delivered to local institution nominated by VISA.

fees.name: Statement Copy Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee per statement.

fees.name: Rabobank Internet Banking Token Replacement Fee
Temporary Limit Increase Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a temporary increase in a Loan Limit is allowed.

fees.name: Loan Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable on acceptance of a Letter of Offer and non-refundable.

fees.name: Loan Limit Increase Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a Loan Limit is increased, other than a Temporary Limit Increase.

fees.name: Legal Fees
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost legal fees incurred by the Bank relating to a Loan or securities.

fees.name: Registration Fees
fees.additionalInfo: Relating to securities for a Loan.

fees.name: Disbursements
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost fees in connection with documentation preparation and administration.

fees.name: Search Fees
fees.additionalInfo: At-cost fee including title and company searches.

fees.name: Document Handling Fee (per document)
fees.additionalInfo: Where the Bank reviews a dealing affecting a security.

fees.name: Unused Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on unused portion of a Loan Limit.

fees.name: Bank Guarantee Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged for issue of bank guarantees.

fees.name: Break Cost
fees.additionalInfo: Charged where a Fixed Interest Option is broken early and the Bank suffers a loss as a result.
